text: ingan-eun jaeang-i geuege ileun hueya junimkke gidohamyeo hoegaehadeo lado geubun-eun geuege eunhyeleul bepu nila geuleona ingan-eun geuga guwonha yeo gidohaessdeon geosdeul-eul mang-gaghago da si usang-eul sewo salamdeul-eul hananim ui gillobuteo banghwangke ham-ila illeo galodoe bulsinham-eulo neohuiga jamsi jeulgila sillo neohuineun buljiog-ui dong banjadeul-ila
